BatchCalcJobDefinitionView.name: BatchCalcJobDefinitionView
BatchCalcJobDefinitionView.description: Represents the details of a Data Processing Engine definition. The definition can also be a file-based definition that is available in your Salesforce org.

DataSpaceApiName.description: Stores the data space API name from Data Cloud.

DefinitionRunMode.description: The execution mode of the Data Processing Engine definition.

Description.description: The description of a Data Processing Engine definition.

DurableId.description: The unique identifier for the field. Always retrieve this value before using it, as the value isn’t guaranteed to stay the same from one release to the next. Simplify queries by using this field instead of making multiple queries.

ExecutionPlatformObjectType.description: Specifies the execution platform object type used to read, transform, and write back processes during the execution of a Data Processing Engine definition. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

InstalledPackageName.description: The name of the package used to add the definition to the org.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the definition is active.

IsTemplate.description: Indicates whether the definition is a template. You can make a copy of a template definition and update it based on your requirements.

LastModifiedBy.description: The unique identifier of the user who modified the definition last.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the definition if it’s contained in a package.

MasterLabel.description: The label of the Data Processing Engine definition.

Name.description: The name of the Data Processing Engine definition.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer Edition organization that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a component in a managed package by using the namespacePrefix__componentName notation.The namespace prefix can have one of the following values: In Developer Edition organizations, the namespace prefix is set to the namespace prefix of the organization for all objects that support it. There’s an exception if an object is in an installed managed package. In that case, the object has the namespace prefix of the installed managed package. This field’s value is the namespace prefix of the Developer Edition organization of the package developer. In organizations that aren’t Developer Edition organizations, NamespacePrefix is only set for objects that are part of an installed managed package. There’s no namespace prefix for all other objects.

ProcessType.description: The process type of the definition.

BatchJob.name: BatchJob
BatchJob.description: Represents an instance of a batch job that is either running and has been run.

BatchJobDefinitionId.description: The unique identifier of the associated batch job definition.

BatchJobDefinitionName.description: The developer name of the associated batch job definition.

EndTime.description: The timestamp when the batch job run was completed.

ErrorDescription.description: The error message in case the batch job run failed.

ExternalReference.description: The unique identifier of the process that's running or has run the batch job.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed the batch job.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this item.

Name.description: The name of the batch job.

OwnerId.description: Unique identifier of the user who initiated the batch job run.

ProcessGroup.description: The group or team for which the batch job is run.

RetryCount.description: The number of times the batch job run is automatically rerun in case it fails.

RuntimeParameter.description: The values of the input variables that are used as filter criteria in a Batch Management job.

StartTime.description: The timestamp when the batch job run was started.

Status.description: The status of the batch job run.

Type.description: The type of batch job that is run.

BatchJobPart.name: BatchJobPart
BatchJobPart.description: Represents one part of a batch job.

BatchJobId.description: The unique identifier of the associated batch job.

EndTime.description: The timestamp when the batch job part was processed.

ErrorDescription.description: The error message in case the batch job part failed.

FailedRecordCount.description: The number of records that the batch job part couldn't process.

FailedRecFile.description: The file containing failed records downloaded as CSV, JSON, or TXT formats during a Data Processing Engine definition’s run by using CRM Analytics (CRMA) or Data Cloud runtime. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

InputRecordCount.description: The number of records that the batch job part must process.

Name.description: The name of the batch job part.

OutputRecordCount.description: The number of records the batch job part has processed.

ParentBatchJobPartId.description: The unique identifier of the part batch job part associated with the batch job part.

RetryCount.description: The number of times the batch job part is automatically rerun in case it fails.

StartTime.description: The timestamp when the batch job part's run was started.

Status.description: The status of the batch job part.

Type.description: The type of node in case the associated batch job is of the type Calc (Data Processing Engine).

BatchJobPartFailedRecord.name: BatchJobPartFailedRecord
BatchJobPartFailedRecord.description: Represents records that a batch job part couldn't successfully process.

BatchJobId.description: The unique identifier of the associated batch job.

BatchJobPartId.description: The unique identifier of the associated batch job part.

ErrorDescription.description: The error message that indicates why the batch job part couldn't process the records.

Name.description: The name of the batch job part failed record.

Record.description: The unique identifier of the batch record that processed the failed records.

RecordName.description: The name of the record that's associated with the batch job part failed record.

ResubmittedBatchJobId.description: The batch job used to submit failed records. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the failed records. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

BatchJobStatusChangedEvent.name: BatchJobStatusChangedEvent
BatchJobStatusChangedEvent.description: Notifies subscribers of when a batch job is completed in a flow.

BatchJobDefinition.description: The unique identifier of the batch job's definition.

EndDateTime.description: The timestamp for when the batch job execution is complete.

EventUuid.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID) that identifies a platform event message. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

ReplayId.description: Represents an ID value that is populated by the system and refers to the position of the event in the event stream. Replay ID values aren’t guaranteed to be contiguous for consecutive events. A subscriber can store a replay ID value and use it on resubscription to retrieve missed events that are within the retention window.

StartDateTime.description: The timestamp for when the batch job execution is started.

Status.description: The status of the batch job.

BatchProcessJobDefView.name: BatchProcessJobDefView
BatchProcessJobDefView.description: Represents the details of a Batch Job definition. The definition can also be file-based definitions that are available in your Salesforce org.

DurableId.description: The unique identifier for the field. Always retrieve this value before using it, as the value isn’t guaranteed to stay the same from one release to the next. Simplify queries by using this field instead of making multiple queries.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the definition is active.

Label.description: The label of the Batch Job definition.

Name.description: The name of the Batch Job definition.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer Edition organization that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a component in a managed package by using the namespacePrefix__componentName notation.The namespace prefix can have one of the following values: In Developer Edition organizations, the namespace prefix is set to the namespace prefix of the organization for all objects that support it. There is an exception if an object is in an installed managed package. In that case, the object has the namespace prefix of the installed managed package. This field’s value is the namespace prefix of the Developer Edition organization of the package developer. In organizations that are not Developer Edition organizations, NamespacePrefix is only set for objects that are part of an installed managed package. There is no namespace prefix for all other objects.

ProcessDefinition.description: The name of the process group for the batch process job definition.

ProcessGroup.description: The team or group for which the definition processes records.

SourceObjectName.description: The API name of the object whose records are processed.

Type.description: The type of process for which the Batch Management job processes records.

TypeInstance.description: The API name of the process that's processed by the Batch Job definition.

Benefit.name: Benefit
Benefit.description: Represents information about benefits associated with the loyalty program. Benefits are mapped to the members based on the tier or other program rules.

Description.description: Detailed description of loyalty benefit.

ImageUrl.description: The URL for the image. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

IsActive.description: Required. Indicates whether the loyalty benefit is active.

IsBenefitSelectionAllowed.description: Indicates whether a member is allowed to select the benefit (true) or not (false). This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty benefit.

PrioritySequence.description: Priority rating of the loyalty benefit.

UnitId.description: The unit of measure for quantity.

Value.description: The quantity included in the loyalty benefit.

BenefitParameterValue.name: BenefitParameterValue
BenefitParameterValue.description: Represents the runtime value of a parameter that's used when executing a flow for benefit action.

BenefitActionParameterId.description: The benefit action parameter value associated with the benefit action.

BenefitId.description: The benefit associated with the benefit action.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the benefit parameter value.

ParameterValue.description: The pre-defined values of the parameter.

BenefitType.name: BenefitType
BenefitType.description: Represents information about the type of benefits such as Support Benefits available to the loyalty program member.

Category.description: Required. The category of the benefit type. Picklist values aren't provided for this field and must be added based on the requirements of the organization.

Description.description: The description of benefit type.

ImageSource.description: The source of the image that represents the benefit type. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the benefit type.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProcessType.description: Required. The process type associated with the loyalty benefit type.

GameDefinition.name: GameDefinition
GameDefinition.description: Represents information about a game that the loyalty program offers to its members.

Description.description: The description of the game.

EndDate.description: The date till which the game can be offered to members.

ExpirationPeriod.description: The number of days or months for which a game is valid for a member to play after the game is assigned to them.

ExpirationPeriodUnit.description: The unit of measure for the ExpirationPeriod field.

IsGameAssignmentRequired.description: Indicates whether members are eligible to play the game only if they are assigned the game (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the game.

StartDate.description: The date from which the game can be offered to members.

TimeoutDuration.description: The duration the game is valid for after a participant starts to play it. The value is specified in seconds.

GameParticipant.name: GameParticipant
GameParticipant.description: Represents a junction between a game definition and a participant who is either an account, a contact, or a loyalty program member.

AccountId.description: ID of the participant’s account that’s associated with the game definition.

ContactId.description: ID of the participant’s contact that’s associated with the game definition.

GameDefinitionId.description: ID of the game definition that has been assigned to the participant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: ID of the participant’s loyalty program member record that’s associated with the game definition.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

ParticipantId.description: ID of the participant’s contact, account, or loyalty program member record.

GameParticipantReward.name: GameParticipantReward
GameParticipantReward.description: Represents the reward that’s provided to a participant after they’ve played a game.

ExpirationDate.description: The date till which the game is valid for the participant to play.

GameParticipantId.description: ID of the associated game participant.

GameRewardId.description: ID of the reward offered to the participant.

IssuedRewardReferenceId.description: ID of the voucher issued to the participant as a reward or the transaction journal that credits the points rewarded to the participant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

SourceActivityId.description: ID of the record that represents the reason why the participant was eligible to play the game.

Status.description: The participant’s status for the game.

GameReward.name: GameReward
GameReward.description: The reward that’s offered to participants of a game.

Color.description: The color of the segment in the Spin the Wheel board that the represents the game reward.

CurrentRewardCount.description: The number of times the reward has been provided to game participants until the current date.

Description.description: The description of the reward.

GameDefinitionId.description: The game that the reward belongs to.

ImageUrl.description: The image URL of the segment in the Spin the Wheel board that the represents the game reward.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

MaximumRewardCount.description: The maximum number of times the reward can be provided to game participants.

Name.description: The name of the reward.

RewardDefinitionId.description: ID of the voucher definition that’s used to issue vouchers or the loyalty program currency that’s used to credit points to participants as game reward.

RewardValue.description: The value of the currency or voucher that's issued to participants as game reward.

WinProbability.description: The probability of the reward being provided to a participant.

JournalReason.name: JournalReason
JournalReason.description: Represents a view that specifies the reason for the action that created a transaction journal.

ApiName.description: The unique name of the object in the API. This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in your org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores. In managed packages, this field prevents naming conflicts on package installations. With this field, a developer can change the object’s name in a managed package and the changes are reflected in a subscriber’s organization.

IsActive.description: Specifies if the Journal Reason picklist values in the Transaction Journal entity are active.

JournalReasonType.description: Provides the reason for the action that created a transaction journal.

MasterLabel.description: The label of the Journal Reason picklist.

JournalSubType.name: JournalSubType
JournalSubType.description: Represents the subcategory of transaction journal.

Description.description: The description of journal subtype.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the journal subtype.

JournalType.name: JournalType
JournalType.description: Represents the category of transactions. For example: accrual, redemption.

Description.description: Detailed description of the journal type.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the journal type.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProcessType.description: Required. The process type associated with the journal type.

Loyalty Management Fields on EngagementC.name: Loyalty Management Fields on EngagementChannelType
Loyalty Management Fields on EngagementC.description: Standard fields extend the EngagementChannelType object for use in Loyalty Management to represent to information promotion eligibility criteria.

Delivery.description: The type of channel that’s eligible for a promotion. This field is only available in orgs where Global Promotions Management is enabled.

Loyalty Management Fields on InternalOrg.name: Loyalty Management Fields on InternalOrganizationUnit
Loyalty Management Fields on InternalOrg.description: Standard fields extend the InternalOrganizationUnit object for use in Loyalty Management to represent to information about Global Promotion Management’s connection with a Marketing Cloud business unit.

BusinessUsage.description: The business purpose of the record.

EmailConfiguration.description: The send classification that’s used by the connected Marketing Cloud business unit to send emails.

OrganizationIdentifier.description: The name of the company’s Marketing Cloud business unit that Global Promotions Management is connected to.

LoyaltyAggrPointExprLedger.name: LoyaltyAggrPointExprLedger
LoyaltyAggrPointExprLedger.description: Represents information about non-qualifying currency points that expire based on a fixed model tier group.

ExpirationDate.description: Required. The date on which the points are set to expire.

ExpirationPoints.description: Required. The number of points that are set to expire on the expiration date.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: Required. The loyalty program currency for which points are set to expire.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: Required. The loyalty program member whose points are set to expire.

PointsStatus.description: The status of the points that are set to expire.

RedeemedPoints.description: The number of points that have been redeemed by the associated loyalty program member out of the total points set to expire.

LoyaltyLedger.name: LoyaltyLedger
LoyaltyLedger.description: Records the points that have been credited or debited for a member across the transactions.

ActivityDate.description: The date on which the transaction was performed by the loyalty program member.

AdditionalNotes.description: The notes about the transactions performed by the loyalty program members.

Correlation.description: The ID of any Salesforce or external record.The field lets you store IDs that are up to 15 characters. If you store IDs that are fewer than 15 characters and use the field to query the object, add spaces after your query term to ensure that the query term is 15 characters.

EscrowPointsCreditDate.description: The date on which the escrow points are credited to the points balance for the loyalty ledger. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

EventType.description: The type of the loyalty transaction.

ExpiryDate.description: The date on which the transaction expires.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyPgmCrcySubtypeId.description: Loyalty program currency subtype associated with the loyalty ledger. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: ID of the loyalty program currency.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: ID of the loyalty program member.

Points.description: The points available for the loyalty program member.

PromotionId.description: The promotion that's applied to the associated transaction resulting in the credit or debit of points. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later

LoyaltyLedgerTraceability.name: LoyaltyLedgerTraceability
LoyaltyLedgerTraceability.description: Represents a tracker for the loyalty ledger. The debit ledger consumes points from the linked credit ledger for a member redemption or an accrual cancellation.

ActionType.description: Required. Specifies the action that creates an entry in the ledger.

CreditLoyaltyLedgerId.description: Required. The credit type loyalty ledger associated with the loyalty ledger tracker. Points are consumed from the credit type ledger for the loyalty program member's debit type ledger.

DebitLoyaltyLedgerId.description: Required. The debit ledger associated with the loyalty ledger tracker. Points are consumed by the debit ledger from the loyalty program member's point balance.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyPgmCurrencySubtypeId.description: The ID of the loyalty program currency subtype associated with the related loyalty ledger.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: The ID of the loyalty program currency associated with the related loyalty ledger.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: The ID of the loyalty program member associated with the related loyalty ledger.

Name.description: The autogenerated number of the record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Points.description: Required. The number of points used from the credit ledger by the debit ledger.

LoyaltyMemberCurrency.name: LoyaltyMemberCurrency
LoyaltyMemberCurrency.description: Represents the information about point balance for a member and a particular currency.

BalanceBeforeReset.description: The last balance of points before resetting the qualifying points of the member.

EscrowPointsBalance.description: The number of escrow points to be credited to the loyalty member's points balance. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

ExpirablePoints.description: Calculates the points to be expired for unredeemed points.

LastAccrualProcessedDate.description: The date when the last accrual was processed. This field indicates the date and time at which the Point Balance calculation process updated the total accrued points for a member and its currency the last time.

LastEscrowProcessedDate.description: The last date and time when the Roll Over Escrow Points to Members Data Processing Engine definition was run to calculate rollover of escrow points. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

LastExpirationProcessRunDate.description: The most recent date when the expired points for a member were calculated.

LastExpiredPtTraceabilityRunDt.description: The latest date on which a process was run to trace points that have expired. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

LastPointsAggregationDate.description: The latest date on which a process was run to trace points that have expired.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastResetDate.description: The most recent date when the qualifying points for members were reset.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyMemberId.description: ID of the loyalty program member.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: ID of the loyalty program currency.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty member currency.

NextResetDate.description: The next date when the qualifying points for members are reset.

PointsBalBeforeSecondLastReset.description: The points balance before the second to last points reset of the member's associated qualifying currency. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

PointsBalance.description: Represents information about Point balance for a member and a particular currency.

RedemStlPendFromDateTime.description: Date and time from when the member's redemption settlement is pending for the currency. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

TotalEscrowPointsAccrued.description: The number of escrow points that the associated member has accrued. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

TotalEscrowRolloverPoints.description: The total number of escrow points that are credited to the points balance until the current date. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

TotalPointsAccrued.description: The total points accrued by the member until today.

TotalPointsExpired.description: The total points expired for a member until today.

TotalPointsRedeemed.description: The total points redeemed by the member until today.

LoyaltyMembershipLifecycle.name: LoyaltyMembershipLifecycle
LoyaltyMembershipLifecycle.description: Represents information about a member's lifecycle in the loyalty program.

Comment.description: The comments for the member's lifecycle event.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date till when the member's lifecycle event is effective.

EffectiveEndDateTime.description: The start date and time of the lifecycle event.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date from when the member's lifecycle event is effective.

EffectiveStartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the lifecycle event.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier of the member's lifecycle event.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyMemberTierId.description: The ID of the loyalty member tier associated with the loyalty membership lifecycle.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: The loyalty program member whose lifecycle is tracked.

MembershipStatus.description: Required. Specifies the status of the member's lifecycle event.

MembershipType.description: Required. Specifies the type of lifecycle event of the member.

Name.description: Name of the lifecycle event.

OrderItemId.description: The order associated with the lifecycle event.

LoyaltyMemberTier.name: LoyaltyMemberTier
LoyaltyMemberTier.description: Represents information about the current tier of the member across tier groups.

AreBenefitsAssigned.description: Indicates whether benefits are already assigned to a member tier.

ChangeReasonType.description: Represents the information of the reason for changing a member tier.

EffectiveDate.description: The date from which the tier is in effect.

EnrollmentStartDate.description: The date on which the member has enrolled in the associated tier.

EffectiveTime.description: The date and time on which a member is assigned the associated tier.

EnrollmentType.description: Specifies the type of enrollment for the loyalty member tier.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyMemberId.description: ID of the loyalty program member.

LoyaltyTierGroupId.description: ID of the loyalty tier group.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty member tier.

ReasonForChange.description: The reason to change a member tier.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the loyalty member tier.

TierExpirationDate.description: The date on which the tier expires.

TierExpirationTime.description: The date and time on which the tier membership ends.

TierMemberIdentifier.description: Unique membership number of the member tier.

LoyaltyPartnerProduct.name: LoyaltyPartnerProduct
LoyaltyPartnerProduct.description: Represents products and product categories offered by loyalty partners.

EndDate.description: The date on which a partner ends the offering of a product for accrual or redemption.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyPartnerId.description: ID of the loyalty program partner.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty partner product.

PartnerCategoryDerivedFieldId.description: A lookup field to show product category in Partner Product.

PartnerProductCost.description: The cost incurred by the partner when members redeem the product during the promotion. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

ProductDerivedFieldId.description: A lookup field to show product in Partner Product.

ProductId.description: Required. ID of the partner product.

StartDate.description: Required. The date on which a partner starts the offering of a product for accrual or redemption.

LoyaltyPgmCurrencySubtype.name: LoyaltyPgmCurrencySubtype
LoyaltyPgmCurrencySubtype.description: Represents a subtype of a fixed-model non-qualifying loyalty program currency.

CostPerUnit.description: Monetary value of each unit of the loyalty program currency subtype.

Description.description: Description of the loyalty program currency subtype.

IsActive.description: Required. Indicates whether the loyalty program currency subtype is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: Required. The fixed-model non-qualifying loyalty program currency associated with the loyalty program currency subtype.

Name.description: Required. The name of the loyalty program currency subtype.

UsagePriorityNumber.description: Required. The usage priority number of the loyalty program currency subtype. The usage priority number decides the order in which the points are redeemed across currency subtypes when multiple currency subtypes expire on the same date.

LoyaltyPgmEngmtAttribute.name: LoyaltyPgmEngmtAttribute
LoyaltyPgmEngmtAttribute.description: Represents information about an engagement attribute for a loyalty program.

DefaultValue.description: The default value for the loyalty program engagement attribute.

Description.description: The description for the loyalty program engagement attribute.

EndDate.description: The date when the loyalty program engagement attribute ends.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: The loyalty program that’s related to the loyalty program engagement attribute.

MaximumResetCountPerPeriod.description: The number of times the current value of an engagement attribute can be reset during a period.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty program engagement attribute.

ResetValueOn.description: The day on which loyalty program members' current value for the engagement attribute must be reset.

ShouldOverwriteAttrCurrVal.description: Indicates whether the associated member's current value is overwritten every period (true) or not (false).

StartDate.description: Required. The date when the loyalty program engagement attribute ends.

Status.description: Required. The status of the loyalty program engagement attribute.

TargetValue.description: The value that the loyalty program member must reach to qualify for rewards of the engagement attribute.

ValueResetFrequency.description: The frequency at which the loyalty program member's engagement attribute value is reset.

LoyaltyPgmEngmtAttrProm.name: LoyaltyPgmEngmtAttrProm
LoyaltyPgmEngmtAttrProm.description: Represents a junction between Loyalty Program Engagement Attribute and Promotion. Associate an engagement attribute with a promotion if you want to track the engagement attribute during the promotion period.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramEngmtAttrId.description: The loyalty program engagement attribute associated with the promotion.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty program engagement attribute promotion. The name is autopopulated.

PromotionId.description: The promotion associated with the loyalty program engagement attribute.

LoyaltyPgmGroupMbrRlnsp.name: LoyaltyPgmGroupMbrRlnsp
LoyaltyPgmGroupMbrRlnsp.description: Represents a junction between a Corporate or Individual type loyalty program member who is part of a group and the Group type loyalty program member.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account with which the loyalty program member is associated.

CanMemberRedeemFromGroup.description: Required. Indicates whether the member can redeem points from a group. This field isn’t used. You can customize and use this field based on your org's requirements.

ContactId.description: The ID of the contact with which the loyalty program member is associated.

ContributionCalculationType.description: Required. Specifies the basis on which the member’s point contribution to a group is calculated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramGroupMemberId.description: ID of the Group type loyalty program member that the related Individual or Corporate type loyalty program member is a part of.

MemberName.description: The name of the related loyalty program member record. For an Individual type loyalty program member, it's the first name and the last name of the contact record associated with loyalty program member record. For a Corporate type loyalty program member, it's the name of the account record associated with the loyalty program member record. This field is read-only.

MemberPointContributionPercent.description: The percentage of a group member's total accrued points that’s transferred to the group.

MemberRole.description: Specifies the role of the loyalty program member in a group. You can add values to the picklist. This field isn't used. You can customize and use this field based on your org's requirements.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty program member group relationship record.

RelatedLoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: The related Individual or Corporate type loyalty program member associated with the loyalty program group member relationship.

LoyaltyPgmMbrAttributeVal.name: LoyaltyPgmMbrAttributeVal
LoyaltyPgmMbrAttributeVal.description: Represents information about the value reached by a loyalty program member for an engagement attribute.

CumulativeValue.description: The cumulative value achieved by a loyalty program member for the related loyalty program engagement attribute across all the periods.

CurrentValue.description: The value achieved by a loyalty program member for the related loyalty program member engagement attribute in during a specific period.

EndDate.description: The end date of the period for which the member's progress towards achieving the related engagement attribute target is tracked.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastResetDate.description: The date on which the related loyalty program member's current value was last reset.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyPgmEngmtAttributeId.description: Required. The loyalty program engagement attribute that’s related to the loyalty program member engagement attribute value.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: The loyalty program member that’s related to the loyalty program member engagement attribute value.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty program engagements attribute related to the loyalty program member engagement attribute value.

ResetCount.description: The number of times the current value of the engagement attribute is reset.

StartDate.description: Required. The start date of the period for which the member's progress towards achieving the related engagement attribute target is tracked.

LoyaltyPgmMbrPromEligView.name: LoyaltyPgmMbrPromEligView
LoyaltyPgmMbrPromEligView.description: Represents a virtual object that provides a consolidated view of the loyalty program member’s eligibility for a promotion and their enrollment status in eligible promotions.

CurrPromotionLiabilityAmt.description: The current liability amount of the related promotion.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency ISO code of the promotion. This field is only available in orgs where multiple currencies are enabled.

CurrentPromotionPointsCount.description: The liability amount incurred for the related promotion till date.

DefaultVoucherDefinitionId.description: The voucher definition that's used as the default in the related promotion.

Description.description: The description of the LoyaltyPgmMbrPromEligView record.

DoesPromHavePtWithFctr.description: Indicates whether the related promotion has a point with factor.

EndDate.description: The end date of the related promotion.

EndDateTime.description: End date and time of the promotion.

ExternalId.description: A combination of the related loyalty program member ID and the related promotion ID.

FulfillmentAction.description: Specifies the fulfillment action of the related promotion.

IsMbrEligBsdCmpnOrSgmt.description: Indicates if the member who is eligible for a promotion is part of a campaign or segment.

IsPromotionEnrollmentRqr.description: Indicates whether the related promotion requires member enrollment.

IssuedPromotionVoucherCount.description: The number of vouchers issued for the related promotion.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: The loyalty program currency that’s used to credit points for the related promotion.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: The loyalty program that's associated with the related promotion.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: The loyalty program member associated with the related promotion.

LoyaltyPromotionType.description: Specifies the type of the related promotion.

MaxPromotionLiabilityAmount.description: The maximum liability amount that the related promotion can incur.

MaxPromotionVoucherCount.description: The maximum vouchers that can be issued for the related promotion.

MaximumPromotionRewardValue.description: The maximum reward value of the related promotion.

MemberEligibilityCategory.description: Specifies whether the loyalty program member is eligible for the promotion.

Objective.description: The objective of the related promotion.

PromEnrollmentStartDate.description: The date when the enrollment in the related promotion starts.

PromotionCumulativeUsageTgt.description: The cumulative usage target of the related promotion.

PromotionEnrollmentEndDate.description: The date when the enrollment in the related promotion ends.

PromotionId.description: The promotion related to the promotion related to the LoyaltyPgmMbrPromEligView record.

PromotionImageUrl.description: The URL of the promotion’s image location. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

PromotionName.description: The name of the related promotion.

PromotionPointFactor.description: The points factor of the related promotion.

PromotionTrxnJournalType.description: The transaction journal type that's associated with the related promotion.

StartDate.description: Required. The start date of the related promotion.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the promotion.

TotalPromotionRewardPointsVal.description: The total points credited to the loyalty program member for the related promotion.

LoyaltyPgmPartnerCurrency.name: LoyaltyPgmPartnerCurrency
LoyaltyPgmPartnerCurrency.description: Represents a junction between a loyalty program partner and a loyalty program currency.

AccrualConversionFactor.description: The factor by which points earned by a loyalty program member for an accrual-type transaction are converted to determine the number of points to be debited from the associated loyalty program partner's points balance or balance amount.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: Required. The loyalty program currency associated with the loyalty program partner currency record.

LoyaltyProgramPartnerId.description: The loyalty program partner associated with the loyalty program partner currency record.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty program partner currency.

RedemptionConversionFactor.description: The factor by which points redeemed by a loyalty program member for a redemption-type transaction are converted to determine the number of points or amount to be credited to the associated loyalty program partner's points balance or balance amount.

LoyaltyPgmPartnerPromotion.name: LoyaltyPgmPartnerPromotion
LoyaltyPgmPartnerPromotion.description: Represents a junction between the Promotion and Loyalty Program Partner objects.

ContributionPercentage.description: Required. The percentage of contribution given by a partner to the promotion.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramPartnerId.description: The loyalty program partner associated with the loyalty program partner prepaid pack or postpaid balance amount.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty program partner promotion.

PromotionId.description: The joint promotion in which the loyalty program partner is a part of.

LoyaltyPgmPtnrLdgrSummary.name: LoyaltyPgmPtnrLdgrSummary
LoyaltyPgmPtnrLdgrSummary.description: Represents the aggregated ledger used by a loyalty program to credit points to or debit points from a prepaid partner's points pack. This ledger can also be used to add or deduct the monetary value of points from the postpaid partner's bill.

ActivityDate.description: Required. The date on which points that are part of the associated loyalty program partner prepaid pack are debited or credited. For postpaid billing, it is the date when the postpaid amount of the loyalty program partner is debited or credited.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyPgmPtnrPrepaidPackId.description: The loyalty program partner prepaid pack associated with the loyalty program partner ledger.

LoyaltyProgramPartnerId.description: The loyalty program partner associated with the loyalty program.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty program partner ledger summary.

Status.description: Required. Specifies the status of the loyalty program partner ledger.

TotalPoints.description: Required. The number of points debited from or credited to the associated loyalty program partner's prepaid pack or postpaid bill amount.

Type.description: Required. Specifies the type of the loyalty program partner ledger.

LoyaltyPgmPtnrPrepaidPack.name: LoyaltyPgmPtnrPrepaidPack
LoyaltyPgmPtnrPrepaidPack.description: Represents information about a prepaid set of points purchased by a loyalty program partner.

EndDate.description: The date until when the loyalty program partner prepaid pack is effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramPartnerId.description: The loyalty program partner associated with the loyalty program partner prepaid pack.

Name.description: The name of the prepaid points pack.

OrderId.description: The order associated with the loyalty program partner prepaid pack.

PurchaseDate.description: Required. The date when the prepaid pack was purchased by the loyalty program partner.

PurchasedPoints.description: Required. The number of points credited to the associated loyalty program partner when a prepaid pack of points is purchased.

RemainingPoints.description: The number of points remaining in the loyalty program partner's prepaid pack.

LoyaltyProgram.name: LoyaltyProgram
LoyaltyProgram.description: Represents the loyalty program within an organization. All the information related to members, tiers, tier groups, program currencies, vouchers, benefits, partners, promotions, transactions are associated with the program.

Description.description: Description of the loyalty program.

EscrowPeriod.description: The number of days after which the escrow points are credited to the existing points balance. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

IsPrimary.description: Indicates whether a loyalty program is the primary program.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Required. The name of the loyalty program. The name must contain at least one alphanumeric character and can't contain special characters such as % and +.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this record.

Status.description: Required. The status of the loyalty program.

Type.description: Specifies the type of loyalty program.

LoyaltyProgramBadge.name: LoyaltyProgramBadge
LoyaltyProgramBadge.description: Represents information about the badge that's associated with a loyalty program.

Description.description: The description of the loyalty program badge.

ImageUrl.description: The URL of the image location for the loyalty program badge.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: The loyalty program that's associated with the badge.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty program badge.

StartDate.description: Required. The date from when the loyalty program badge can be assigned to members.

Status.description: Required. Specifies the status of the loyalty program badge.

ValidityDuration.description: Specifies the unit of measure for the validity period.

ValidityDurationUnit.description: The number of days or months in the validity period.

ValidityEndDate.description: The date after which the badge is no longer assigned to members. Select a value for this field if the badge's validity type is FixedDate.

ValidityType.description: Required. Specifies the model used to determine the deration for which the badge is valid for a member.

LoyaltyProgramCurrency.name: LoyaltyProgramCurrency
LoyaltyProgramCurrency.description: Represents qualifying and non-qualifying currencies associated with the program. Qualifying currency represents the engagement of a member with the program and it’s associated with a tier group. Non-qualifying currency represent the points that the member earns for redemption.

CostperUnit.description: The cost for each currency associated with a loyalty program.

CurrencyType.description: Required. Type of the loyalty program currency.

DoesAllowLedgerTracing.description: Indicates whether points credited by accrual transactions and debited by redemption transactions for a fixed-model non-qualifying currency is traced (true) or not (false). This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

DoesAllowNegativeBalance.description: Indicates whether a non-qualifying currency allows members to hold a negative point balance. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

ExpiryModel.description: The model evaluates the type of expiration of points based on the fixed date or customer’s activity.

ExpiryPeriodFrequency.description: The frequency type to evaluate the expiration of currency.

ExpiryPeriodUnit.description: Unit of the period in which currency expiration is done.

ExtendExpiration.description: The field decides if the expiration date is changed on the exact day or the last day of the month.

HasEscrow.description: Indicates whether points can be escrowed for the loyalty program currency. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

IsActive.description: Required. Indicates whether the loyalty program currency is active.

IsPrimary.description: Indicates whether the loyalty program currency is primary.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: The ID of the loyalty program.

LoyaltyTierGroupId.description: The ID of the loyalty tier group.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty program currency.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyTier.name: LoyaltyProgramCurrencyTier
LoyaltyProgramCurrencyTier.description: Repesents a junction between non-qualifying loyalty program currency and loyalty tier.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: Non-qualifying loyalty program currency associated with the loyalty tier.

LoyaltyTierId.description: Loyalty tier associated with the loyalty program currency.

Name.description: Autogenerated number of the loyalty program currency tier.

NegativePointsBalanceLimit.description: Maximum negative point balance that members of the loyaty tier can hold for the associated loyalty program currency.

LoyaltyProgramMbrPromotion.name: LoyaltyProgramMbrPromotion
LoyaltyProgramMbrPromotion.description: Represents details about the promotions to be applied for a loyalty program member. Tracks the enrollment status, promotion status, and progress for a promotion of a member.

CumulativeUsageCompletePercent.description: The percentage of the promotion completed by the member.

CumulativeUsageCompleted.description: The amount of the frequency type promotion completed by the member.

CumulativeUsageTarget.description: The target of the frequency type promotion that must be achieved by the member to complete the promotion.

IsAutoEnrolled.description: Indicates whether the loyalty program member is automatically enrolled in the promotion.

IsEnrollmentActive.description: Indicates whether the enrollment for the promotion is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: The loyalty program member associated with the promotion.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the loyalty program member promotion.

PromotionId.description: The ID of the loyalty program member promotion.

LoyaltyProgramMember.name: LoyaltyProgramMember
LoyaltyProgramMember.description: Represents information about member who belongs to a loyalty program. The member can be individual or corporate type.

AccountId.description: ID of the account with which the loyalty program member is associated. This field is optional for a Group type member.

CanReceivePartnerPromotions.description: Indicates whether the member can receive partner promotions for the program (true) or not (false).

CanReceivePromotions.description: Indicates whether the member can receive promotions for the program (true) or not (false).

ContactId.description: ID of the contact with which the loyalty program member is associated. This field is optional for a Group type member.

EnrollmentChannel.description: Channel through which membership is enrolled.

EnrollmentDate.description: Required. Date when the member enrolled to the loyalty program.

GroupCreatedByMemberId.description: The Individual or Corporate type loyalty program member who created the group or requested for the group to be created. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

GroupName.description: The name of the group when the type of membership in the loyalty program is Group. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

IsEligibleForTierAssessment.description: Indicates whether the member is eligible for tier assessment. A member is eligible for tier assessment when there is a change in their qualifying points balance. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

LastActivityDate.description: The date when the loyalty program member last performed a transaction.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

MemberStatus.description: Required. The status of the member in the loyalty program.

MemberType.description: Required. The type of membership in the loyalty program.

MembershipEndDate.description: The date on which the membership ends.

MembershipLastRenewalDate.description: The most recent date when the membership was renewed.

MembershipNumber.description: The membership number of the loyalty program.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ReferralCode.description: The code that the member can share with others who want to join the loyalty program. If no referral code is entered during enrollment, an automatic referral code is generated for the member. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

ReferredById.description: Reference to Member who referred to the program.

RelatedCorporateMembershipId.description: The related corporate membership ID of the loyalty program.

StatementFrequency.description: The frequency of loyalty balance statements.

StatementLastGeneratedDate.description: The date on which the statement is last generated.

StatementMethod.description: The mode of loyalty balance statements.

LoyaltyProgramMemberBadge.name: LoyaltyProgramMemberBadge
LoyaltyProgramMemberBadge.description: Represents a badge that’s assigned to a loyalty program member.

EndDate.description: The date until when the loyalty program badge is assigned to the related loyalty program member.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramBadgeId.description: The loyalty program badge that's associated with the loyalty program member.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: The loyalty program member that's associated with the badge.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique identifier of loyalty program member badge.

Reason.description: The reason why the member badge was assigned.

StartDate.description: Required. The date from when the loyalty program badge is assigned to the related loyalty program member.

Status.description: Required. Specifies the status of the member badge.

LoyaltyProgramMemberCase.name: LoyaltyProgramMemberCase
LoyaltyProgramMemberCase.description: Represents a junction between a loyalty program member and a case.

CaseId.description: Required. The Case record associated with the loyalty program member case.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: Required. The loyalty program member associated with the loyalty program member case.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty program member case.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the loyalty program member case.

LoyaltyProgramMemberMerge.name: LoyaltyProgramMemberMerge
LoyaltyProgramMemberMerge.description: Represents information about merged loyalty program memberships.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique identifier of LoyaltyProgramMemberMerge records.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this record.

Reason.description: Required. The reason for merging the memberships.

SourceMemberId.description: Required. The loyalty program member whose membership is merged with the target loyalty program member.

SrcMbrDataBody.description: The details of the source loyalty program member, such as transaction journals, ledgers, vouchers, tiers, and currencies.

SrcMbrDataContentType.description: Specifies the format in which the source member data is stored.

SrcMbrDataLength.description: The number of characters in the SrcMbrDataBody field.

SrcMbrDataName.description: The unique identifier of the data stored in the SrcMbrDataBody field.

Status.description: Required. Specifies the status of merge.

TargetMemberId.description: Required. The loyalty program member that the source membership was merged into.

LoyaltyProgramPartner.name: LoyaltyProgramPartner
LoyaltyProgramPartner.description: Represents partners that are associated with a given loyalty program. Partners can be an accrual partner, a redemption partner, or both.

AccrualCostperUnit.description: The cost per point associated with the transactions of accrual partner. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

AlertValue.description: The value that’s used to send an alert to a partner to indicate the minimum points required when the billing type is prepaid or the maximum outstanding amount when the billing type is postpaid. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

BillingType.description: Specifies the method in which the loyalty program partner is billed.

CreditedPoints.description: The number of points credited to partners (using prepaid billing) for member redemptions, accrual cancellations, or any custom processes. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

DebitedPoints.description: The total number of points debited from the partner (using prepaid billing) for member accruals, redemption cancellations, or any custom processes. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

LastProcessedDateTime.description: The last date and time when the prepaid points balance or the outstanding postpaid bill amount for a partner was calculated. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyPartnerId.description: Required. Account ID of the loyalty program partner.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: Required. ID of the loyalty program.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty program partner.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PartnerCategory.description: The category of the program partnership.

PartnerIndustry.description: Required. The industry type of the program partner. Picklist values aren't provided for this field and must be added based on the requirements of the organization.

PartnerStatus.description: Required. The status of the partner in the loyalty program. The default value is Active.

PartnerType.description: Required. The type of the program partnership.

PartnershipEndDate.description: The date on which the partnership with the program ends.

PartnershipStartDate.description: Required. The date on which the partnership with the program starts.

PointsBalance.description: The number of points available with the loyalty program partner using prepaid billing. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

PostpaidBillAmount.description: The total amount of all credits minus debits for partner transactions from the partnership start date. A positive value indicates that the partner is liable to the program. A negative value indicates the program is liable to the partner. The total amount that either the partner is liable to pay to the program or the program is liable to pay to the partner. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

PurchasedPoints.description: The total number of points that the partner (using prepaid billing) has purchased across all their packs. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

RedemptionCostperUnit.description: The cost per point associated with the transactions of redemption partner. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

LoyaltyProgramPartnerLedger.name: LoyaltyProgramPartnerLedger
LoyaltyProgramPartnerLedger.description: Represents the ledger used by a loyalty program to credit points to or debit points from a prepaid partner's points pack or from a postpaid partner’s point balance. This ledger can also be used to add or deduct the monetary value of points from the partner's postpaid bill.

ActivityDate.description: Required. The date on which the loyalty program member transacts with the loyalty program partner.

LoyaltyLedgerId.description: Required. Specifies the type of the loyalty program partner ledger.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: Required. The loyalty program member that’s related to the loyalty program partner ledger.

LoyaltyProgramPartnerId.description: Required. The loyalty program partner that’s related to the loyalty program partner ledger.

Points.description: Required. The number of points credited to or debited from the loyalty program partner's points balance or postpaid account balance.

PromotionId.description: The promotion that’s related to the loyalty program partner ledger.

TransactionJournalId.description: Required. The transaction journal that’s related to the loyalty program partner ledger.

Type.description: Required. Specifies the type of the loyalty program partner ledger.

LoyaltyProgramProcess.name: LoyaltyProgramProcess
LoyaltyProgramProcess.description: Represents information about loyalty program processes that determine how transaction journals are processed.

Description.description: The description of the loyalty program process.

ExecutionType.description: Specifies the method used for executing the loyalty program process. Determines how transaction journals are processed. If you select Real Time, incoming transactions are processed as soon as they’re created. If you select Batch, then Run Program Process for Transaction Journal action in Flows is used to schedule when pending transaction journals are processed.

JournalSubTypeId.description: The ID of the journal subtype record associated with the loyalty program process record.

JournalTypeId.description: The ID of the journal type record associated with the loyalty program process record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: The loyalty program associated with the loyalty program process record.

LoyaltyTierGroup.description: The tier group of a program that's associated with the loyalty program process.This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

Name.description: Required. The name of the loyalty program process.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProcessType.description: Required. Specifies the type of loyalty program process.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the loyalty program process.

LoyaltyProgramWidget.name: LoyaltyProgramWidget
LoyaltyProgramWidget.description: Represents the configuration of a widget that a user can apply to the out-of-the-box widget templates and FlexCards provided by Omnistudio. The configuration helps implement custom UI changes, such as promotion type, promotion tag line, and so on for a user.

CustomizedContent.description: The detail about the customization that’s applied to a widget.

Description.description: The description of the widget.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the widget.

ProgramId.description: Required. The identifier of the loyalty program that's associated with the widget.

PromotionId.description: The ID of the promotion that the widget is associated with.

PromotionStageId.description: The ID of the promotion stage that the widget is associated with.

TemplateName.description: Required. The name of the widget template.

TemplateVersion.description: Required. The version of the widget template.

LoyaltyTier.name: LoyaltyTier
LoyaltyTier.description: Represents information about tiers of a loyalty program. A tier group has a set of tiers in a sequential order.

Color.description: The color that represents the tier. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

Description.description: Detailed description of the tier.

EligibleEnrollmentType.description: The type of enrollment for which a member is eligible.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: The ID of the loyalty program associated with the loyalty tier. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later.

LoyaltyTierGroupId.description: ID of the loyalty tier group.

MaximumEligibleBalance.description: The maximum balance that's required for loyalty program members to be eligible for the tier. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

MinimumEligibleBalance.description: The minimum balance that's required for loyalty program members to be eligible for the tier. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty tier.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence number indicates the ranking of the tier. The tier with the highest sequence number indicates the highest tier.

LoyaltyTierBenefit.name: LoyaltyTierBenefit
LoyaltyTierBenefit.description: A junction object that associates the loyalty benefits with the loyalty program tiers.

BenefitId.description: Required. Benefit associated with the loyalty tier benefit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyTierId.description: Tier associated with the loyalty benefit.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty tier benefit.

LoyaltyTierGroup.name: LoyaltyTierGroup
LoyaltyTierGroup.description: Represents information about tier groups of a loyalty program. Tier group categorizes members based on their loyalty points.

Category.description: The category of the loyalty tier group.

Description.description: Detailed description of the tier group.

EndDate.description: The end date of the loyalty tier group.

ExtendExpiration.description: Required. The field decides if the tier is changed on the exact day or the last day of the month.

IsActive.description: Required. Indicates whether the loyalty tier group is active (true) or not (false).

IsHiddenToMembers.description: Indicates whether the loyalty tier group is hidden (true) or not (false).

IsPrimary.description: Indicates whether the loyalty tier group is primary (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty tier group.

QpResetDate.description: Required. Start date of the QP reset process.

QpResetFrequency.description: Required. The frequency at which members’ qualifying points must be reset.

QpResetPeriod.description: Required. Unit of the period for QP reset.

StartDate.description: The start date of the loyalty tier group.

TierAssessmentCurrencyId.description: The ID of the Loyalty Program Currency that's used to assess and assign tiers to members of the loyalty program. Members are assigned tiers based on their points balance for the currency. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

TierModel.description: Required. It’s the model that decides the start date of the qualifying period.

TierPeriodQuantity.description: Required. The period after which members’ tier must be reset.

TierPeriodUnit.description: Required. The frequency type for the tier assessment.

LoyaltyTierMshpFeeOption.name: LoyaltyTierMshpFeeOption
LoyaltyTierMshpFeeOption.description: Represents the options by which members can pay for tier or club memberships.

EffectiveEndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the loyalty tier membership.

EffectiveStartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the loyalty tier membership.

FeeType.description: Specifies the type of payment for the membership fee.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the membership is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: The ID of the non-qualifying loyalty program currency associated with the loyalty tier.

LoyaltyTierId.description: The ID of the loyalty tier associated with the membership.

MembershipDurationType.description: The duration of the loyalty tier membership.

MembershipFee.description: The amount of the loyalty tier membership.

Name.description: The name of the tier membership fee option.

Points.description: The points used to pay for the membership fee.

LoyaltyTierPromotion.name: LoyaltyTierPromotion
LoyaltyTierPromotion.description: Represents a junction between a member tier and a loyalty promotion.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyTierId.description: The ID of the loyalty tier associated with the promotion.

Name.description: The name of the tier promotion.

PromotionId.description: The ID of the loyalty promotion associated with the tier.
