MemberBenefit.description: Represents details about a benefit that’s assigned to a loyalty program member and has a benefit action that’s triggered.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account associated with the member benefit.

BenefitId.description: Required. The ID of the benefit associated with the member benefit.

ContactId.description: The ID of the contact associated with the member benefit.

Description.description: The description of the member benefit.

EndDate.description: The end date of the member benefit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

MemberId.description: The ID of the member associated with the member benefit.

Name.description: The name of the member benefit.

PrimaryRefObjectRecord.description: The ID of a record created by the member benefit.

PrimaryRefObjectRecordTitle.description: The title of a record created by the member benefit.

SourceType.description: Required. The source of the benefit.

StartDate.description: The start date of the member benefit.

Status.description: Required. The status of the member benefit.

NetworkReferencedObject.name: NetworkReferencedObject
NetworkReferencedObject.description: A junction object that associates the loyalty program with the Experience Cloud site.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the Network Referenced Object.

NetworkId.description: Required. The Id of the Experience Cloud site associated with the loyalty program.

ReferencedObjectId.description: The object associated with the Experience Cloud site.

Promotion.name: Promotion
Promotion.description: Represents a promotion associated with the loyalty program. It captures the information such as type of the promotion, issue of a voucher or credit points, promotion enrollment, and status of the promotion.

BusinessUnitId.description: ID of the internal organization unit that contains the details of the Marketing Cloud business unit associated with the promotion.

CampaignId.description: The campaign associated with the promotion.

CumulativeUsageTarget.description: The number of times a member must participate or the amount of money spent to qualify for a reward.

CurrentLiabilityAmount.description: The liability amount incurred for the promotion until now. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

CurrentPointCount.description: The liability amount incurred for the promotion until now. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

DefaultVoucherDefinitionId.description: The voucher associated with the promotion.

Description.description: Description of the promotion.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the promotion. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later where Global Promotions Management is enabled.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the promotion. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later where Unified Promotions is enabled.

EnrollmentEndDate.description: The last date to enroll in the promotion.

EnrollmentStartDate.description: The first date to enroll in the promotion.

FulfillmentAction.description: Select how a loyalty member is rewarded for fulfilling promotion requirements.

GameDefinitionId.description: ID of the game definition associated with the promotion.

ImageUrl.description: The URL for the promotion image. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the promotion is active. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

IsCloned.description: Indicates whether the promotion has been created by cloning an existing promotion. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

IsEnrollmentRequired.description: Indicates whether enrollment is required to participate in the promotion.

IsPointsWithFactor.description: Indicates whether the promotion is applied by multiplying points with a factor or by using the fixed value in the TotalRewardPoints field. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

IsQuickPromotion.description: Indicates whether the records represent a quick promotion (true) or not (false). This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

IssuedVoucherCount.description: The number of vouchers issued for the promotion until current date. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: The loyalty program currency associated with the promotion.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: The loyalty program associated with the promotion.

MaximumLiabilityAmount.description: The maximum liability amount that can be incurred for the promotion.

MaximumRewardValue.description: The total value that can be accumulated for the promotion.

MaximumVoucherCount.description: The maximum number of vouchers that can be issued for the promotion. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the promotion.

Objective.description: Business objective of the promotion. For example, launching a new product, keeping customers satisfied, or clearing stock.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PointFactor.description: The factor with which points are multiplied or divided when IsPointsWithFactor is set to true. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

PriorityNumber.description: The priority number of the promotion. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later, where Global Promotions Management is enabled.

ProductCatalogId.description: ID of the product catalog associated with the promotion. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later, where Global Promotions Management is enabled.

PromotionCode.description: The unique code of the promotion. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later, where Global Promotions Management is enabled.

PromotionConfiguration.description: The configuration of a quick promotion. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

RelatedPromotionId.description: ID of the promotion that was cloned to create the promotion.

RuleLibraryId.description: ID of the promotion that was cloned to create the promotion. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

StartDate.description: Required. The start date of the promotion.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the promotion. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later where Global Promotions Management is enabled.

TotalRewardPoints.description: The points awarded on availing the promotion.

TransactionJournalType.description: The journal type that has been applied for the promotion. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

PromotionActionableList.name: PromotionActionableList
PromotionActionableList.description: Represent of a junction between a promotion and an actionable list.

ActionableListId.description: The ID of the actionable list associated with the promotion actionable list.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The autogenerated number of the promotion actionable list.

PromotionId.description: The ID of the promotion associated with the promotion actionable list.

EndDate.description: The date from which the channel is eligible for the promotion.

EngagementChannelTypeId.description: ID of the engagement channel type that the channel belongs to.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

PromotionId.description: ID of the promotion for which the channel is eligible.

RetailLocationGroupId.description: ID of the retail location group that’s eligible for the promotion.

RetailStoreId.description: ID of the retail store that’s eligible for the promotion.

StartDate.description: Required. The date till which the channel is eligible for the promotion.

PromotionExecEvalGrpItem.name: PromotionExecEvalGrpItem
PromotionExecEvalGrpItem.description: Represents either a promotion or a promotion group in a promotion execution evaluation group.

CurrentItemRecordId.description: The ID of promotion or the promotion group that the item record belongs to.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the promotion execution evaluation group item.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of this record.

ParentPromEvaluationGroupId.description: The ID of the parent execution evaluation group

PreviousItemRecordId.description: The ID of the promotion or promotion group that's sequenced before the current item.

PromotionLimit.name: PromotionLimit
PromotionLimit.description: Represents the limit of a promotion.

Category.description: Required. The category of promotion limit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: ID of the loyalty program currency for which the promotion limit is set. Specify a loyalty program currency when the limit type is PointsCredited.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

PromotionId.description: ID of the promotion that the limit is for.

Type.description: Required. The type of promotion limit.

Value.description: Required. The value of the promotion limit.

PromotionLimitUsage.name: PromotionLimitUsage
PromotionLimitUsage.description: Represents information about the total usage of a promotion limit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

PromotionLimitId.description: ID of the promotion limit for which the usage is tracked.

Usage.description: Required. The usage of the promotion limit till date.

PromotionLoyaltyPtnrProdt.name: PromotionLoyaltyPtnrProdt
PromotionLoyaltyPtnrProdt.description: Represents a relationship between a promotion and a loyalty partner product. It indicates the products or product categories that are applied to a particular promotion.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyPartnerId.description: The loyalty partner associated with the promotion.

LoyaltyPartnerProductId.description: Required. The loyalty partner product associated with the promotion loyalty partner product.

LoyaltyProductId.description: The loyalty product associated with the promotion.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the promotion loyalty partner product.

ProductCategoryId.description: The product category associated with the promotion.

PromotionId.description: The promotion associated with the promotion loyalty partner product.

PromotionMarketSegment.name: PromotionMarketSegment
PromotionMarketSegment.description: Represents a relationship between a promotion and Data Cloud segment. It indicates the segments targeted for a particular promotion.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency ISO code of the promotion. This field is only available in orgs where multiple currencies are enabled.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

MarketSegmentId.description: The ID of the market segment associated with the promotion market segment.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the promotion market segment.

PromotionId.description: The ID of the promotion associated with the promotion market segment.

PromotionSegmentId.description: The ID of the related promotion segment. This field is accessible in orgs with a Commerce Cloud license, where users have access to Promotions.

PromotionPartyUsage.name: PromotionPartyUsage
PromotionPartyUsage.description: Represents the details of number of times a promotion has been used by a customer.

AccountId.description: ID of the account associated with the organization that has used the promotion.

AdditionalAttributeInfo.description: Specifies the details of the additional promotional attribute for Contact, Account or a member in JSON format.

ContactId.description: ID of the contact associated with the person who has used the promotion.

IssuedVoucherCount.description: The number of vouchers that have been issued to the customer as the associated promotion’s reward.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: ID of the loyalty program member who has used the promotion.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

OrderCount.description: The number of orders for which the customer has applied the promotion.

PartyId.description: ID of the person or the organization that has been provided the discount.

PointsCredited.description: The number of points that have been credited to a loyalty program member as the associated promotion’s reward.

PromotionId.description: Required. ID of the promotion for which the customer’s usage is tracked.

Type.description: The type of customer for whom the promotion usage is tracked.

UsageCount.description: The number of times a party has used a promotion.

PromotionPartyUsageDetail.name: PromotionPartyUsageDetail
PromotionPartyUsageDetail.description: Represents the amount that's discounted by a promotion for a transaction journal.

AccountId.description: ID of the account associated with the organization that has used the promotion.

ContactId.description: ID of the contact associated with the person who has used the promotion.

DiscountAmount.description: The monetary discount provided to the person or organization who has availed the promotion.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: ID of the loyalty program member who has used the promotion.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

PartyId.description: ID of the person or the organization that has been provided the discount.

PartyType.description: The type of customer that has been provided the discount.

PromotionId.description: Required. The promotion that has provided the discount to the customer.

TransactionJournalId.description: ID of the transaction journal that represents the customer activity for which the promotion has been applied.

PromotionProduct.name: PromotionProduct
PromotionProduct.description: Represents a junction between a promotion and an product that’s eligible for the promotion.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

ProductId.description: Required. ID of the product that’s eligible for the associated promotion.

PromotionId.description: The promotion for which eligible product is selected.

PromotionProductCategory.name: PromotionProductCategory
PromotionProductCategory.description: Represents a junction between a promotion and an product category that’s eligible for the promotion.

ProductCategoryId.description: Required. of the product category that’s eligible for the associated promotion.

PromotionRuleTemplate.name: PromotionRuleTemplate
PromotionRuleTemplate.description: Represents the configuration of a promotion rule template.

ApiName.description: The API name of the promotion rule template.

Category.description: The category of the promotion rule template.

Description.description: The description of the promotion rule template.

IconUrl.description: The URL of the promotion rule template’s icon.

JournalTypeId.description: The ID of the journal type that represents the type of customer activity the promotion rule template is applicable for.

Label.description: The name of the promotion rule template.

RuleConfiguration.description: The promotion rule configuration in JSON format.

RuleRewardConfiguration.description: The rule reward configuration details in JSON format, which are applicable for the promotion rule template.

PromotionStage.name: PromotionStage
PromotionStage.description: Represents a stage when the promotion sends an email to the promotion's target audience. With Global Promotions Management, a promotion launch email is sent after the promotion is activated.

ApiName.description: Required. The unique name of the promotion stage.

Configuration.description: The configuration of the promotion stage.

Description.description: The description of the promotion stage.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the promotion stage.

PromotionId.description: The ID of the promotion that the stage belongs to.

SequenceNumber.description: Required. The sequence number of the stage in a promotion. The sequence number of the Promotion Launched stage is 1.

Type.description: Required. The type of promotion stage.

PromotionStageEmailTemplate.name: PromotionStageEmailTemplate
PromotionStageEmailTemplate.description: Represents a junction between a promotion stage and an email template. With Global Promotions Management, a promotion's launch email is associated with the promotion's Promotion Launched stage. You can customize the promotion launch email based on your company’s branding.

EmailCustomConfiguration.description: The customized content of an email template.

EmailTemplateId.description: Required. The ID of the email template associated with the promotion stage.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The unique number of the promotion stage email template.

PromotionStageId.description: The ID of the promotion stage that the associated email template belongs to.

TransactionJournal.name: TransactionJournal
TransactionJournal.description: Represents information about loyalty transactions that track activities, member behavior, and adjustments.

ActivityDate.description: Required. The date of the transaction.

BookedFareClass.description: The class of ticket service that the member booked.

BookedRoomType.description: The type of room the member booked.

BookingDate.description: The date of the member booked a reservation or purchased goods or services.

Brand.description: The hotel chain where the member stayed or the brand of the purchased or rented goods or services.

Channel.description: The channel the member used for transactions.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The three-letter ISO 4217 currency code of the monetary currency in which the transaction took place.

Destination.description: The ending location for a member's trip or the place where an order shipped to.

Distance.description: The miles or kilometers traveled by a member or an order's shipping distance.

EndDate.description: The end date associated with the transaction.

EngagementChannelTypeId.description: The ID of the engagement channel that the customer used for the purchase. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

EscrowPointsCreditDate.description: The date on which the escrow points are credited to the associated loyalty program member's point balance. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

Establishment.description: The unique identifier for the location where the member stayed or purchased goods or services.

ExternalTransactionNumber.description: The transaction number from the external systems.

FlightNumber.description: The airline flight number the member booked.

Industry.description: Specifies the type of the industry.

InvoiceDate.description: The date the invoice was generated.

IsParentTransaction.description: Indicates whether the transaction journal represents the primary activity within a group of activities. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

JournalReason.description: Specifies the reason for the action that created a transaction journal. This field can store up to 999 values. After the field reaches 999 values, rename existing values that you no longer use instead of deleting values and adding new ones.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: The loyalty program associated with the transaction.

MemberId.description: The member associated with the transaction.

Name.description: The autogenerated number of the transaction journal.

OrderId.description: The order associated with the transaction.

OrderItemId.description: The order items associated with the transaction.

Origin.description: The starting location for a member's trip or the place where an order shipped from.

PartnerId.description: Participating partners where members can add or redeem points.

ProductCategoryId.description: The category of the product associated with the transaction.

ProductId.description: The product associated with the transaction.

PromotionId.description: The promotion associated with the transaction journal. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

Quantity.description: The length of the booked stay or the order quantity.

QuantityUnitOfMeasureId.description: The unit of measure for the booked stay or the order quantity.

RedeemedPointsExpirationInformation.description: The details of the fixed type non-qualifying points that are redeemed in a transaction journal and their corresponding expiration dates. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.RedeemedPointsExpirationInformation isn't able in the Object Manager and can't be customized.

ReferredMemberId.description: The name of the person the member referred.

ReferredPartyId.description: The ID of the contact or account associated with the transaction journal. The contact ID belongs to the person whose activity the transaction journal represents. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

RelatedCorporateMembershipId.description: The corporate membership associated with the transaction.

RelatedJournalId.description: The related journal entry associated with this transaction.

StartDate.description: The start date associated with the transaction.

Status.description: Required. The status of the transaction.

TotalPromotionDiscount.description: The total discount provided by the associated promotion for the activity that the transaction journal represents. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

TransactionAmount.description: For reservations, the total fees or prepaid balance. For goods and services, the total purchase price.

TransactionLocation.description: The location where the loyalty member purchased goods or services.

TransactionSourceLocationId.description: The ID of the retail store where the activity that the transaction journal represents has taken place. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

TraveledFareClass.description: The class of ticket service that the member traveled.

Unique Identifier.description: The unique identifier of the transaction journal.

VoucherCode.description: The voucher code generated by an external system.

Voucher.name: Voucher
Voucher.description: Represents details about a voucher that's issued to a loyalty program member.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account to which the voucher is issued. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

BenefitId.description: The benefit associated with the voucher.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the member.

DiscountPercent.description: The discount percentage associated with the voucher.

EffectiveDate.description: Required. The date the voucher goes into effect.

EffectiveDateTime.description: The date and time from when the voucher is available for redemption. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ExpirationDateTime.description: The date and time when the voucher expires and is no longer available for redemption. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: The member who has been issued the voucher.

Name.description: The autogenerated number of the voucher.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PromotionId.description: The promotion associated with the voucher.

Reason.description: The reason why the voucher was issued.

RedeemedValue.description: The voucher balance that was redeemed. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

RemainingValue.description: The remaining value of the voucher after partial redemption. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

ReservationKey.description: The key that's used to redeem a reserved voucher. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ReservedDateTime.description: The date and time when the voucher is reserved for redemption. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ReservedValue.description: The value of the voucher reserved by the customer. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

Status.description: Required. The status of the voucher.

TransactionJournalId.description: The transaction journal associated with the member voucher when the voucher results from accrual of points.

UseDate.description: The date the voucher was used.

VoucherCode.description: The voucher identifier generated by an external system.

VoucherDefinitionId.description: The loyalty voucher definition associated with the voucher.

VoucherDefinition.name: VoucherDefinition
VoucherDefinition.description: Represents details about a voucher definition that’s associated with a loyalty program.

AutogeneratedCodeLength.description: The length of the auto-generated voucher code. If no value is specified, the default is eight digits. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

CodePrefix.description: The prefix of the auto-generated voucher code. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

CodeSuffix.description: The suffix of the auto-generated voucher code. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

CostPerVoucher.description: The liability incurred for each voucher that's issued. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

Description.description: The description of the voucher.

DiscountPercent.description: The discount percentage associated with the voucher.

EffectiveDate.description: Required. The date on which the voucher becomes valid.

EffectiveDateTime.description: The date and time from when the vouchers issued by the voucher definition can be redeemed by customers. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ExpirationDate.description: The date the voucher expires. The expiration date is only valid for the fixed date model.

ExpirationDateTime.description: The date and time on which the vouchers issued by the voucher definition are no longer available for customers to redeem. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ExpirationPeriod.description: The number of days or months in the expiration period.

ExpirationPeriodUnit.description: The unit for the expiration period.

ExpirationType.description: Required. The type of expiration for the voucher.

HasTimeBasedVoucherPeriod.description: Indicates whether vouchers issued using the definition are effective and expire at a specific date and time. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ImageUrl.description: The URL for the voucher definition image. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

IsActive.description: Required. Indicates whether the voucher is active (true) or not (false).

IsPartialRedeemable.description: Indicates whether the voucher can be partially redeemed (true) or not (false). This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: The ID of the loyalty program.

Name.description: The name of the voucher.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PartnerAccountId.description: The partner associated with the voucher.

ProductCategoryDerivedFieldId.description: A look up to show product category in voucher definition.

ProductDerivedFieldId.description: A look up to show product in voucher definition.

ProductId.description: The product associated with the voucher.
